title: Clash of Clans and Clash Royale mobile revenue 2018
summary: This bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis representing Game, and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Clash_Royale where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 597.0.
The lowest category is found at Clash_of_Clans where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 567.0.
